p.span: Thanks to all our families for your cooperation these past weeks. Weekly packets may be picked up from 2:30-4:00 Tuesdays and 8:00-12:00 Wednesday. If you need to get into the school at anyother time please contact the school at 225-3317.

div.span: Videos on how to access school email and install office at home for free can be found in the
Talk to your Board about Re-Opening the School

Greetings JHS Community,
Wednesday Governor Bullock announced a plan to transition into a phased reopening of the state. On May 7, 2020, schools will have the option to return to in-school teaching at the discretion of local school boards. The JHS school board trustees want to share their email addresses in an effort to make sure you know how to reach your area representative to share constructive feedback.
Please visit the School Board page of our website, which can be found by following the "Read More" link below, and click the E-mail link under your board member's name to contact them.
Best,
Denise Brunett
JHS School Board Chair
Message regarding Re-Opening School from Mr. Norbeck
